summary: Waldeck-Frankenberg is a Kreis  in the north of Hesse, Germany.
full_text: Waldeck  was a sovereign principality in the German Empire and German Confederation and, until 1929, a constituent state of the Weimar Republic. It comprised territories in present-day Hesse and Lower Saxony, . On the map, the tiny northern red dot of land is Pyrmont and the southern lands in red are Waldeck.
title: Waldeck (state)
